operations module¶

operations.data_base_connection()¶

Create database connection.

Returns

Database handler

operations.execute_query(query, cnx)¶

Send query to SQL database server and execute it.

Parameters

  • query – Query to execute

  • cnx – Database handler

Returns

Response from SQL server

operations.hash_password(password: str) → str¶

Hash a password for storing

Parameters

password – Password to hash

Returns

Hashed password

operations.insert_data_query(data: list, tab_name: str) → str¶

Creates SQL query to insert some data to database.

Parameters

  • data – List of data to insert

  • tab_name – Type of data set

Returns

Query string

operations.select_data_query(list_of_data, tab_name, where_field, where_value)¶

Create SQL query to select some data.

Parameters

  • list_of_data – List of data

  • tab_name – Name of SQL table

  • where_field – Field to identify selection

  • where_value – Value of field to identify selection

Returns

Query string

operations.verify_password(stored_password, provided_password)¶

Verify a stored password against one provided by user

Parameters

  • stored_password – Password from database

  • provided_password – Password from user input

Returns

True if password is correct, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

cash-up-server
